member.summary: Gets or sets if want to show Users as rows.

member.summary: Gets or sets if want to show groups as rows.

member.summary: Gets or sets if want to show roles as rows.

member.summary: Gets or sets if you want to include permissions as access rights for given entities (Column of the sheet).

member.name: P:Novalys.VisualGuard.Security.Tools.Documentation.PivotMatrix.VGPivotMatrixSettings.ShowRoles
member.summary: Gets or sets if you want to include roles as access rights for given entities (Column of the sheet).

member.name: P:Novalys.VisualGuard.Security.Tools.Documentation.PivotMatrix.VGPivotMatrixSettings.ShowGroups

member.name: P:Novalys.VisualGuard.Security.Tools.Documentation.PivotMatrix.VGPivotMatrixSettings.ShowOnlyWhenRelationExists
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to only show the items related to other items

member.summary: Creates a global sheet containing all applications.

member.name: P:Novalys.VisualGuard.Security.Tools.Documentation.PivotMatrix.VGPivotMatrixSettings.ShowApplicationSpecificSheet
member.summary: Creates a separte sheet for each application.(Sheet per application)

member.name: P:Novalys.VisualGuard.Security.Tools.Documentation.PivotMatrix.VGPivotMatrixSettings.ShowEntityCountPerMatrixItem
member.summary: Shows the number of items related to each entity. Gets or sets if users count per role need to be displayed in sheet. Ex. RoleA granted to 10 users, PermissionA granted to 10 users.

member.name: P:Novalys.VisualGuard.Security.Tools.Documentation.PivotMatrix.VGPivotMatrixSettings.ShowUsersGroupsDependencySheet
member.summary: Gets or sets if 'matrix - showing dependencies between users and groups' need to be shown as a separate sheet

member.summary: Gets or sets if 'matrix - showing dependencies between users and groups' need to be shown in each application sheet
